meanings.definition: A person who removes or dispels myths or misconceptions.
meanings.sent1: The demythologizer explained that dragons are not real creatures.
meanings.sent2: The demythologizer at the museum clarified the historical inaccuracies in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The demythologizer humorously debunked the idea that eating carrots helps you see in the dark.
meanings.sent4: She was like a demythologizer, shining a light on the shadows of misinformation.
meanings.sent5: The demythologizer was like a myth-buster, revealing the truth behind popular legends.

meanings.definition: To remove or dispel myths or misconceptions.
meanings.sent1: He tried to demythologize the superstitions surrounding black cats.
meanings.sent2: The professor demythologized the ancient beliefs about the stars.
meanings.sent3: The magician demythologized his own tricks to show they were just illusions.
meanings.sent4: Her words demythologized the fear of the unknown, bringing clarity to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The documentary demythologized the urban legends, revealing the truth behind each story.
